title: Red Exclamation Queue

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Hi guys I recently  Q'd up for a ranked Duo with a friend and immediately upon leaving champ select, my client crashed, and restored itself to an earlier version and repatched itself up to the current (7.19) version. Unfortunately I got hit with the Leaverbuster (understandable) but now my Queues all have a Red Exclamation Point Hazard Symbol next to the Queue timer. I understand being hit with the leaverbuster and put into a Low Priority Queue, but every night Ive been put into Queues for hours at a time. Literally two nights ago, I Queued up for a normal summoner rift draft pick, and I fell asleep, then woke up with the queue timer at over 600 minutes! Insane right?! I got ten whole hours of sleep, who'dve thought. But really, a 10 hour queue period seems excessive to me and I really don't know what to do. Tonight, I Queued up in a game against bots and I've currently been in queue for over 30 minutes.  I've ran the Hextech Repair tool, reinstalled LoL, Opened and closed it, and restarted my computer. Honestly I just want to play League again, and if there's a fix then Id love to hear it. 

Also I know I'm terrible, be gentle pls <3

replies.body: That is an abnormal wait time, and I think your network might be losing comms with the matchmaking service.  In this case, you should run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your connection doesn't cut off while waiting in queue.  If that doesn't help, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into this with you individually.
